def_cn: 不直截了当的;拐弯抹角的
def_en: If you describe a statement as oblique, you mean that is not expressed directly or openly, making it difficult to understand.

def_cn: （线或角）斜的，倾斜的，偏斜的
def_en: An oblique line is a straight line that is not horizontal or vertical. An oblique angle is any angle other than a right angle.
